channel.title: 2 Compile Errors (think there simple to most people) Help Needed Please!
channel.description:
this is wat i get [code] client.java:28007: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackNPC() ^ client.java:31872: illegal start of expression public int spec = 20; // specs - by Danie B ^ 2 errors
[/code]
can anybody help me fix any of them

item.title: 2 Compile Errors (think there simple to most people) Help Needed Please!
item.dc:creator: @joecooper joecooper
item.description:
@joecooper wrote:

now i got this lol 

client.java:28007: illegal start of expression
        public void ManipulateDirection() {
        ^
1 error

wat do i do and wat do i search to put it in right place hehe

item.title: 2 Compile Errors (think there simple to most people) Help Needed Please!
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

For these 3 errors

client.java:28007: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackNPC() ^ client.java:31872: illegal start of expression public int spec = 20; // specs - ^ client.java:31873: illegal start of expression public int specTimer = 0; // specs ^

Looks like you declared the booleans and ints in the wrong sections and for this error

[code]client.java:31876: ‘}’ expected

^[/code]

Open client.java then CTRL + G and find 31876 and add the } where it’ supposed to be.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Compile Errors (think there simple to most people) Help Needed Please!
item.dc:creator: @Blackester Blackester
item.description:
@Blackester wrote:

im not that experienced in java but it looks like your missing a beggining symbol

ok i got it

}
public void ManipulateDirection() {
	//playerMD = misc.direction(absX, absY, skillX, skillY);
	if (playerMD != -1) {
		//playerMD >>= 1;
		updateRequired = true;
		dirUpdateRequired = true;

notice the little } up at the top im pretty sure thats what your missing

of course… if im wrong plz correct me
